Golden Statue

Golden Statue is a rare variant of the Revived Statue found in Remixed Dungeon. It always carries a Golden Sword +4.

Description

According to the in-game description: “It's truly hard to believe that, this magnificent statue isn't just another decoration, but a malicious creature waiting for an unsuspecting adventurer. At first glance you could've sworn that it's _%s_ was just part of it's arm.”

Item Class

* Java Class: GoldenStatue.java * Inherits From: Statue.java

Stats

* HP: 15 + (5 × dungeon depth) * Defense Skill: 4 + dungeon depth * Attack Skill: Same as regular Revived Statue * Damage: Same as regular Revived Statue * EXP for Kill: 0 * Carcass Chance: 0

Behavior

* Passive Nature: The statue is normally passive and will not attack first (inherited from Revived Statue) * Aggro Trigger: Becomes hostile when attacked, when a Scroll of Rage is used nearby, or when other hostile actions are taken * Immunities: Immune to Toxic Gas, Poison, Bleeding, and Leech status effects (inherited from Revived Statue) * Resistances: Resistant to Death enchantment and Scroll of Psionic Blast (inherited from Revived Statue) * Movement: Does not follow the player around the dungeon (doesn't beckon) (inherited from Revived Statue)

Equipment

* Weapon: Always carries a Golden Sword +4 * Weapon Properties: The Golden Sword is pre-identified and always upgraded to +4 * Strength Requirement: Statue's strength is adjusted to match the required strength of the Golden Sword

Habitat

* Much rarer variant than regular Revived Statue * Found in special rooms and treasure areas throughout the dungeon * Like other statues, more likely to appear on deeper dungeon levels due to scaling stats

Strategy

* Since the statue is passive, you can often avoid combat by not attacking it or using rage-inducing items nearby * If you do engage, be aware that its damage scales with dungeon depth * Guaranteed to drop a Golden Sword +4 upon defeat - this is its main value * The Golden Sword +4 is a valuable high-level weapon with special properties * Magic damage and ranged attacks can be effective since the statue has no special magic resistance beyond its resistances

Variants

* Revived Statue - Base variant that carries random weapons * Armored Statue - A variant that carries armor instead of a weapon

Related Pages

* Revived Statue - Base mob that Golden Statue inherits from * Armored Statue - Another statue variant that carries armor * Golden Sword - The weapon always carried by Golden Statue * Statue Types - Different types of statues in the dungeon * Enemies - All enemy types in the game
